General.Name: Shandong Jining Ruyi Woolen Textile Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. designs, produces, and sells worsted woolen fabrics and garments in China, Germany, and internationally. It offers professional clothing, and uniforms; functional wool fabrics for use in various clothing characteristics, such as anti-UV, anti-static, waterproof, oil-proof, anti-fouling, cool, moisture-permeable, heat-storing, machine washable, flame-retardant, and illuminating protection; and ecological wool fabrics. The company was formerly known as Shandong Jining Ruyi Woolen Textile Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. in June 2017. Shandong Ruyi Woolen Garment Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Jining, China.
